New Delhi-110075 NHAI Policy Guidelines Allocation of work amongst empanelled advertising agencies for release of Display Advertisement 2017 th No.4.21/2017_ Dated the 11 October, 2017 (Decision taken by Executive Committee in the meeting held on 21.08.2017 on Agenda Item No.314.08) Subj: Allocation of work amongst empanelled advertising agencies for release of Display Advertisement. 1 _ Display advertisement, LA notifications, tender notices etc_ are released by NHAI from time to time. The matter of allocation of works amongst  empanelled advertising   agencies at NHAI HQ was discussed in the Executive Committee Meeting held on 21.08.2017. 2_ It has been decided that whenever there is a display advertisement to be released by NHAI HQ, creatives from all the advertising agencies empanelled with NHAI HQ shall be invited. A Committee comprising of the following officers shall select three best creatives: Out of which, the Competent Authority may select one creative to be used for the advertisement as Ist and rank 2nd and 3rd best also. 50% of the total volume of advertisement (amount in Rs.) shall be released through the agency whose creative has been selected as the best; the 2nd best creative agency shall be given 30% of the total volume and the 3rd best as 2O% of the total volume of the work: (a) CGM of the concerned Division dealing with the subject Chairman (b) Shri PK Dutta, DGM (HR/ Admn.III) / Member Shri Bandhupriya Sarkar, Manager (Admn)-III (c) Shri SK Chauhan, DGM (F&A) Member 3. For other  works, viz. release of tender  notices, LA notifications where no creativity is involved, the work shall be allotted strictly as per the roster being maintained at NHAI HQ 4 This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. (A.K. Sadhu) Chief General Manager (Coordination) To All Officers and Employees of HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices. mrnM WHA 314th
